sentences.sContent: Lily spent years caring for her sick uncle.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lily spent years caring for her sick uncle.
sentences.sCn: 莉莉照顾了她生病的叔叔好多年。

sentences.sContent: After his parents cashed in, he lived with his uncle.
sentences.sContent_eng: After his parents cashed in, he lived with his uncle.
sentences.sCn: 他在父母去世后，与叔叔在一起过。

sentences.sContent: When she was orphaned,her uncle sent her to orphanage.
sentences.sContent_eng: When she was orphaned,her uncle sent her to orphanage.
sentences.sCn: 她的父母刚一去世，她的叔叔便把她送进了孤儿院。

synos.tran: 叔叔；伯父；伯伯；舅父；姨丈；姑父

phrases.pCn: [口]山姆大叔（美国政府的绰号）
汤姆叔叔；逆来顺受的美国黑人

trans.tranOther: used by children, in front of a first name, to address or refer to a man who is a close friend of their parents
